mapper.select:
SELECT
t
ORDER BY f_id DESC
ORDER BY ${orderField}

SELECT p.* FROM t_ware_positionadjustmain p LEFT JOIN t_ware_positionadjustdetail pd on p.f_id =pd.f_main_id LEFT JOIN t_ware_inventorytraylocalmap ild on ild.f_id =pd.f_inventorytraylocalmap_id WHERE ild.f_batch_no=#{batchNo} GROUP BY p.f_id
